requirements.summary: Add ambient background music with play/pause control that handles autoplay restrictions and persists preference locally.
acceptanceCriteria: The app uses this exact music URL: https://assets.mixkit.co/music/preview/mixkit-soft-piano-ambient-111.mp3
A visible control exists to start/stop the music (and if implemented, mute/unmute).
